welcome_message_title: Welcome to Ban Lam Sam Kaeo
welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ban Lam Sam Kaeo, a charming city known for its beautiful temples, vibrant markets, and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights, with a capacity of 30 million passengers per year.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves low-cost airlines and has a capacity of 20 million passengers per year.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may be slow and unreliable at times.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Suvarnabhumi International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Suvarnabhumi International Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free Wi-Fi throughout the airport, with a 2-hour time limit.
